column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Liliya - Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. If you decide to dine with us again
column2: please feel free to send back any item that doesn't meet your complete and total satisfaction. Moreover
column3: you can always request your ramen to be made with "Less Salt" or "Less Oil." There are a great many ways to modify your dish to your liking. Thank you again.
